resources.string: This type of notification allows the app to use a fake location, even in other apps.
Your location is faked, even in other apps.
Allow access to show your location on the map.
Your location will not be shown.
Prevent your workplace from tracking you by changing your virtual location to anywhere you like. Sit back and relax at a café while you’re working from the office.
All we need is your permission.
The Location Permission is used to show your current location on the map. It’s also used to change your location. Fackla cannot function without it.
Changing your location with Fackla requires enabling Developer Mode on your device. Tap ”Become a Developer“ then find and tap Build Number seven times. The process may vary depending on your device.
Now that you’ve enabled Developer Mode you need to select Fackla as your mock location app. Tap ”Select Mock Location App…“ to select Fackla as your mock location app.
